blogPost.excerpt: Workplace scores, by Blind. Take a brief survey to see culture & and sentiment ratings by verified employees. You can use Blind Pulse on the Blind app.
blogPost.body: Workplace scores, by Blind. Take a brief survey to see culture & and sentiment ratings by verified employees. You can use Blind Pulse on the Blind app.
blogPost.title: Blind Pulse - Workplace culture & sentiment ratings by verified employees
blogPost.author: Seungjun Lee

localize.description: 工作场所评分，由盲。通过简单的调查，查看经过验证的员工对企业文化和情感的评价。您可以在Blind应用上使用Blind Pulse。
localize.tagline: 经过验证的员工对工作场所文化和情绪的评价。

localize.description: 工作場所評分，由盲。通過簡單的調查，查看經過驗證的員工對企業文化和情感的評價。您可以在Blind應用上使用Blind Pulse。
localize.tagline: 經過驗證的員工對工作場所文化和情緒的評價。

previous.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
previous.title: Worksphere - Software to manage your flexible workplace

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作场所管理软件，为企业提供员工在办公室或远程工作的选择。Worksphere可以自动预约办公桌，安全输入，并为您提供办公室使用数据，以正确确定工作场所的规模。
localize.tagline: 管理灵活工作场所的软件

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作場所管理軟件，爲企業提供員工在辦公室或遠程工作的選擇。Worksphere可以自動預約辦公桌，安全輸入，併爲您提供辦公室使用數據，以正確確定工作場所的規模。
localize.tagline: 管理靈活工作場所的軟件

next.excerpt: QuotaPath has integrated with HubSpot! With this CRM integration, sales reps can track quota attainment & earnings in real-time. Import HubSpot deals to automate the commission process. Close more deals, grow your revenue, and motivate your team.
next.title: QuotaPath + HubSpot integration - Calculate earnings & attainment from HubSpot deals

localize.description: QuotaPath已与HubSpot整合! 有了这个CRM集成，销售代表可以实时跟踪配额的实现和收益。导入HubSpot交易以自动化佣金流程。完成更多交易，增加您的收入，并激励您的团队。
localize.tagline: 计算HubSpot交易的收益和成就。

localize.description: QuotaPath已與HubSpot整合! 有了這個CRM集成，銷售代表可以實時跟蹤配額的實現和收益。導入HubSpot交易以自動化佣金流程。完成更多交易，增加您的收入，並激勵您的團隊。
localize.tagline: 計算HubSpot交易的收益和成就。
